segments.text: I see a woman drying dishes, completely unaware of the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading across the floor, and she’s standing right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is soaked, but she doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long the water has been running like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and the water is just pouring onto the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s so focused on that plate, like nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t turned around yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are right behind her, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a mess waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone stops this before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
